pull_commit_message:
Bug 1198626 - (LayerScope) Change the position of zoom controls.

1. Shift right zoom controls.
2. Zoom change only apply to texture viwers. All the list controls keep still.
3. Correct postions of some elements.
4. Don't pass key event to the frame controller if it already get focus.

pulltitle: Bug 1133007 - (LayerScope) Prevent sending duplicate texture image
pullsbody:
1. Create a singleton holder to hold all singltons in LayerScope
2. Send the content of a texture only if it was altered after last transmission.
pull_commit_message:
Bug 1133007 - (LayerScope) Prevent sending duplicate texture image

If the content data of a texture node is null, that means the content is
already in image pool. In this case, the viewer should relink a new TextureNode
with the image content in the image pool.

Bug 1168015 - (LayerScope) Texture dump performance improvement on B2G

1. Do RB swap at view side for images came from graphic buffers.
2. Add 2D view icon so that a user know which buffer view currently present.

pulltitle: Bug 1163908 - [LayerScope] Add Heat map in viewer
pullsbody:
1. Correct z-index of setting dialog
2. Add Draw grid of quads setting option.
3. Remove layer tree and buffer caption to give more room to real data.
4. Add a 3D button to swtich between 2D and 3D heap view.
5. 3D heap-map view
6. Pasrse and conver draw data into frame in dataprocess module.
7. Improve 2D canvas drawing performance while zooming.

pulltitle: Move protocal buffer parsing from main thread to worker thread
pullsbody:
LayerScope becomes sluggish while connecting with a profile target. That's
because the main thread is heavily parsing protocol buffer pacakages from
WebSocket. Move data parsing from main thread to a dedicated worker to fix this
symptom.
pull_commit_message:
Move protocal buffer parsing from main thread to worker thread

LayerScope becomes sluggish while connecting with a profile target. That's
because the main thread is heavily parsing protocol buffer pacakages from
WebSocket. Move data parsing from main thread to a dedicated worker to fix this
symptom.

Move protocal buffer parsing from main thread to worker thread

LayerScope becomes sluggish while connecting with a profile target. That's
because the main thread is heavily parsing protocol buffer pacakages from
WebSocket. Move data parsing from main thread to a dedicated worker to fix this
symptom.

pulltitle: Bug 1130766 - Reduce the size of saved file
pullsbody:
1. TexturePool: contructs a global texture pool to prevent duplcate textures.
2. ZIP: uses JSZip for serialization stuff.
3. Progrssbar: show a progressbar to reveal serialization status.
